summary: July 9 is the 190th day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: John Allen "Hog" Hannah  is a former American football left guard who played for the New England Patriots  in the National Football League . He was elected to the Pro Football Hall of Fame in 1991, and Sports Illustrated dubbed him, on its August 3, 1981, cover, "The Best Offensive Lineman of All Time."
title: Hannah R. Hall
